casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Dion WARREN. No. 312A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 1, 2015. Bryan E. Gates, Jr., Winston-Salem, for Warren, Charles Dione. James A. Wellons, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of September 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of October 2015."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 4th day of November 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
